title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Spanning the Gap
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper     Spanning the Gap                Spanning the Gap          Spanning the Gap was a park newspaper produced and distributed from 1983-2007 through the Division of Visitor Services, Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area. Its goal was to educate visitors and neighbors about the recreation area's resources, events, and issues. To find a feature story from past issues of Spanning the Gap use one of the following:  Online search engine at top right of this page The History & Culture side menu The Nature side menu Quick Index
